thread.title: Jack Owen
thread.title_full: Stoney Creek Wine Press reviewed by Jack Owen

author: Jack Owen
title: Jack Owen
text: From the many options for label design I found a great combination that really enhanced the presentation of my wine. The glossy label is beautiful. My friends were as impressed as I was. The labels arrived a few days after ordering, were exactly as expected, and easy to apply.
